Text: Rip is OK but I feel it could be better for 3.65 gb, it is a long movie tho.

@ Crist
Yeah, I know. But this is what you get for a re-rip (from a source 720p to a 720p again). If it is from a source 1080p to a 720p, it would slightly maintain a better quality.

I hate same dimension re-rip.

Video very decent.
Audio is better than what PublicHD has out right now.
